product_name: Topeak Joe Blow Race Floor Pump
long_description: Easy to read, easy to pump, and compatible with Presta or Schrader valves, the Topeak Joe Blow Race Floor Pump is loaded with features that make inflating your tires before each ride extra convenient. SmartHead technology features adapter that works on Presta and Schraeder valves without changing any parts; thumb-lock lever ensures air-tight seal. Easy-to-read gauge inflates tires up to 200 psi. Padded elastomer handle grips for comfort; 47 in. extra-long hose for maximum extension. Stable, wide tri-foot base with thinner steel barrel for easier pumping. Pump head also features air release button allowing fine-tuning of air pressure. Ball/Bladder needles and Dunlop valve adapters are included and fit neatly in their holder.
short_description: Easy to read, easy to pump, and compatible with Presta or Schrader valves, the Topeak Joe Blow Race Floor Pump is loaded with features that make inflating your tires before each ride extra convenient.
